original_text: But the Lord was angry with me, because of you. He would not answer my prayer. He said, ‘You have said enough! Do not speak to me about that any more.
korean_text: 여호와께서 너희 때문에 내게 진노하사 내 말을 듣지 아니하시고 내게 이르시기를 그만해도 족하니 이 일로 다시 내게 말하지 말라

sentences.original_text: But the Lord was angry with me
He would not answer my prayer
Do not speak to me about that any more.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그것에 대해 내게 더 이상 말하지 말라.'
